title: China calls EU tariffs on EVs unfair, says it will take necessary measures to defend industry
content: Beijing said it continues to believe the EU's probe into China's subsidies for EVs are promoting unfair competition in the name of fair competition.
summary: Beijing said it continues to believe the EU's probe into China's subsidies for EVs are promoting unfair competition in the name of fair competition.

title: China’s new rules are worrying insiders about how far Beijing will go on controlling critical metals
content: New export controls have shaken the critical minerals industry. Insiders are worried that Beijing will leverage its global supply chain dominance in unprecedented ways.
summary: New export controls have shaken the critical minerals industry. Insiders are worried that Beijing will leverage its global supply chain dominance in unprecedented ways.

title: Ukraine carries out one of the largest ever drone attacks on Moscow as Kursk incursion continues
content: The tides of the Russia-Ukraine war, largely carried out through artillery and drone advances, changed earlier this month.

title: Search for Sicily yacht passengers enters third day with tech tycoon Mike Lynch and 5 others missing

title: Recent volatility spike was a 'huge overreaction,' but expect more ahead, UBS strategist says

title: Harris' record suggests she would prioritize the Indo-Pacific, CFR political scientist says

title: The world's largest steel industry is going through a 'winter' amid a supply glut and weak demand

title: EV company Nio aims to build battery chargers and swap stations in every Chinese county

title: European Union slashes planned tariffs on China-made Tesla EVs, other Chinese firms

title: Brits snap up lower mortgage deals as Bank of England rate cut boosts property market
